synopsis.text: Since middle school, Mizuto Irido and Yume Ayai shared a romantic bond filled with flirtation and sweet moments. However, their relationship soured over petty disagreements, leading to a bitter breakup upon graduation. As they prepared for a fresh start in high school, fate had a twisted surprise in store: their parents had married, making them stepsiblings! To maintain harmony within their new family, they agreed to act as loving siblings, keeping their past relationship a secret. But with shared memories and undeniable chemistry, can they truly suppress their feelings and uphold the "sibling rule"? The stakes are high, as whoever acknowledges the other's attractiveness first will face defeat, jeopardizing their status as the older sibling in this unconventional household.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
